name: TMW Front-end Guidelines
tagline: Guidelines and standards for front-end development at TMW
body:
Our guidelines have moved to [the TMW Tech blog](http://tech.tmw.co.uk/code/TMW-frontend-guidelines/).

The [markdown in this repo](https://github.com/tmwagency/TMW-frontend-guidelines) is still maintained if you would like to fork it and create your own version.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
